participant_1.background: i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind. i used to be a painter but now i am a housekeeper.

participant_2.background: i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. i've light skin with big brown eyes. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race. my main transportation is my motorbike.
